item.title: Building & Deploying your first Progressive Web App
item.description: Progressive Web Apps are very much in use by some of the biggest companies like Twitter, Forbes, Alibaba, Instagram, Flipkart e.t.c and have gained popularity. Building a PWA is quite easy and simple. In this tutorial, we’re going to build a simple Progressive web app (A weight converter app). Let’s roll :) TABLE OF CONTENTS Introduction Starter files App description Building the UI Add JavaScript Functionality Build the Progressive Web App Deploy to Netlify Conclusion INTRODUCTION I’m sure by now you must have heard or read about Progressive Web Applications.
